type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.DropDownDirection
type.summary: Defines, on the which side of the the dropDown menu is located.

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.DropDownDirection.Up
field.summary: A dropDown menu is on the top.

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.DropDownDirection.Down
field.summary: A dropDown menu is at the bottom.
